item.title: Setting Up iOS Development Environment
item.description: Hardware and OS requirements A workstation/laptop running Windows 7 (64-bit) A MacBook running Yosemite OS X 10.10 or higher Mobile Devices and OS requirements: iPhone or iPad running iOS 8.4 or above (jailbroken) Note Why do you need a rooted or jailbroken phone for your test environment? It is as simple as the ability to customize and install any tools and also to run unsigned apps from nontraditional app stores on the device.
